name: py-prompt-toolkit
description: Library for building powerful interactive command lines in Python

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wcwidth
dependencies.description: Measures number of Terminal column cells of wide-character codes

dependent_to.name: py-ipdb
dependent_to.description:
ipdb is the iPython debugger and has many additional features, including
a better interactive debugging experience via colorized output.

dependent_to.name: py-spatialist
dependent_to.description:
This package offers functionalities for user-friendly geo data
processing using GDAL and OGR.

dependent_to.name: py-questionary
dependent_to.description:
Questionary is a Python library for effortlessly building pretty command
line interfaces.

dependent_to.name: py-ipython
dependent_to.description:
IPython provides a rich toolkit to help you make the most out of using
Python interactively.

dependent_to.name: py-py2neo
dependent_to.description:
Py2neo is a client library and toolkit for working with Neo4j from
within Python applications and from the command line.
